description: This file defines a React component 'Quiz' that renders a quiz interface, manages its state, and interacts with application context and external data to display and submit quiz scores.

methods.name: Quiz()
methods.description: React functional component rendering a quiz page with score handling and submission logic.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission, calculates a mock score, updates state, and records the quiz score via context.
